description:
Junior League Sports Basketball is a fun based sports game, which will have you standing up, moving around and literally re-enacting the movement of the game you’re playing.

Use your Joy-Con™ to dribble your way past the competition and ‘slam dunk’ your way to victory.

Includes a number of game modes including Knockout Cup and Tournament modes. As well as the single player mode you can also go head to head with your friends in the local multiplayer mode.

Impress your friends with your super skill moves by learning the special Joy-Con gestures. Learn to use steal shields, triple jumps and slam dunks to maximum effect!

Become a legend in your own living room!
name: Junior League Sports - Basketball
